entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's mind was accessed by Harry, indicating that Voldemort is aware of the situation.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry accessed Voldemort's mind and learned about his plan to check on the others.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is present with Harry and Hermione, reacting to Harry's revelation.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is worried about the situation and asks Harry questions.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape's presence at Hogwarts makes it a safer location for the cup.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is one of the locations where the others are being kept safe.

relationships.description: Harry accessed Voldemort's mind, allowing him to learn about Voldemort's plan.
Voldemort is aware of the cup and its location.
Harry's knowledge about Voldemort's plan relates to Hogwarts, where one of the others is being kept safe.
Voldemort associates Snape with Hogwarts, making it a safer location for the cup.
